attributes.action: lobby 'The Liverpool Way' fans website to allow the return of prodigal son Rashid by unbanning him.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rashid's lively contribution is sorely missed from the FF.  His brand of opinion expression was refreshing and measured.  We want him unbanned NOW!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
